questions.text: Which of the identification signs are used for designation of trucks   with a maximum mass exceeding 3500 kg and a length of over 7 m?
The interval of 2 seconds between the moving passenger cars is sufficient when:

answers.text: the visibility is limited
the road is dry
the visibility is reduced due to fog
the road is wet

questions.text: Where in the roads outside the populated areas is the stay permitted?

answers.text: outside the driveway
in the specially designated areas only
it is allowed to stay at the rightmost of the roadway when the road side is not wide enough

questions.text: In this situation, the driver of a slow- moving road vehicle:

answers.text: may use the leftmost road lane while overtaking
may use the middle road lane while bypassing
may use the leftmost road lane while turning
is obliged to use the rightmost road lane
on a section of the road slope
on an overpass
in a tunnel
in a subway

questions.text: When driving at night, which of the following can be used to designate cargo which extends forwards by more than 1 m from the frontmost part of the vehicle?

answers.text: red light
red flag
white light
a white reflector

questions.text: Administrative offenses established at the time they are committed can be imposed with a fine ticket if:

answers.text: The offense is not punishable by a temporary decommissioning of the motor vehicle
The offense is not punishable by deduction of control points
The offense is not punishable by deprivation of the right to drive a motor vehicle
The offense is not punishable by compulsory revocation of the motor vehicle’s registration

questions.text: If the tire pressure is lower than prescribed, the tire tread is worn out:

answers.text: unevenly, at certain places
always on the right side in the direction of rotation
in the middle of the tread, along the entire circumference
at both edges, along the entire circumference

questions.text: When towing an inoperative vehicle, it is prohibited:

answers.text: for the towing motor vehicle to have a category other than the category of the motor vehicle being towed
to tow in reduced visibility below 50 m
to transport passengers in the motor vehicle being towed
to tow when the towing vehicle is with a trailer

questions.text: Two-wheel vehicle, with working volume of the engine up to 50 cm³ and constructive maximum speed over 45 km/h, belongs to:

answers.text: Category A
Category B1
Category AM
Category B

questions.text: When driving on a highway, the driver is prohibited:

answers.text: to stop the vehicle for a stay or parking outside the places specially designated for this purpose
to drive a vehicle with attached trailer
to drive or to stop in the lane for emergency stopping, except in case of damage of the vehicle as well as in case of health problems of the driver or passengers in the vehicle

questions.text: If the acceleration skid control (ASR) indicator stays lit while the engine is running, this means that:

answers.text: the brake pads are worn out
the system is ready for use
there is a technical problem in the system
